decision_conditions: No Secured by Design accreditation awarded by the Hillingdon Metropolitan Police Crime Prevention Design Adviser (CPDA) on behalf of the Association of Chief Police Officers (ACPO) has been submitted in support of the application. As such, the proposed development is not considered to be secure by design and is contrary to Policy DMHB 15 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Development Management Policies (2020) and Policy D11 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of condition 17 (Secured by Design) of planning permission reference 49467/APP/2022/2801, dated 18-05-2023, for 'Partial demolition and extension to existing building to provide additional self-storage floorspace (Use Class B8) with associated new car and cycle parking, refuse storage, landscaping and other associated works ancillary to the development.'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
